measured property.test description: Experiments for specific heat [J/(kg K)], or heat capacity, were conducted using a heat flow meter on unconditioned and dried samples at 10 °C, 20 °C, 30 °C and 40 °C.
Experiments for thermal conductivity [W/(m K)] were conducted using a heat flow meter on unconditioned and dried samples at 15 °C and either 45 °C or 65 °C.

Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min and mass loss rate [g/s] in the cone calorimeter at three heat fluxes: 25 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, 50 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, and 75 kW/m<sup>2</sup>.

measured property.test name: heat release rate per unit area
measured property.display name: Heat Release Rate Per Unit Area (HRRPUA)
measured property.test description: Experiments for heat release per unit area [kW/m<sup>2</sup>] were conducted on samples conditioned at 20°C and 50% relative humidity using a cone calorimeter at three different heat fluxes: 25 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, 50 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, and 75 kW/m<sup>2</sup>.
Carbon monoxide yield was measured during cone calorimeter experiments conducted at heat fluxes of 25 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, 50 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, and 75 kW/m<sup>2</sup>.
Experiments for specific heat release rate [W/g], were conducted using a micro-scale combustion calorimeter at a heating rate of 30 K/min.

derived property.test description: Soot yield [g/g] was calculated from smoke obscuration data collected in cone calorimeter experiments conducted at heat fluxes of 25 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, 50 kW/m<sup>2</sup>, and 75 kW/m<sup>2</sup>.
Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in both micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments and cone calorimeter experiments.
Heats of reaction [kJ/kg] were calculated from simultaneous thermal analyzer data.
Heat of gasification [kJ/kg] was calculated from simultaneous thermal analyzer data.
Ignition temperature [T<sub>ign</sub>] is a derived quantity computed from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.

derived property.test name: melting temperature and enthalpy of melting
derived property.display name: Melting Temperature and Enthalpy of Melting
derived property.test description: Melting temperature [T<sub>melt</sub>] and the enthalpy of melting [kJ/kg] were derived quantities computed from data collected in simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments.
Band averaged emissivity was calculated from reflectance measurements conducted with an integrating sphere and Fourier transform infrared spectrometer.
